EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: Online Club Selection
EmailTemplate.subject: Online Club Selection
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear parents,
Thank you for your patience for the new on line club system. It is a real step in the right direction as the school continues to grow and provide more and more opportunities for the students.
If you have not registered for a club, then please visit the link (click here) as clubs will start on Tuesday 23rd of April. If you require any further information then please contact each club teacher directly, all emails can be found on the school website.
Kindest regards,
Mr Hoult and Mr Carr
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
